altername_name: Ranch Story: Colobocle Station for Girl
Bokujō Monogatari: Korobokkuru Sutēshon for Gāru
name: Harvest Moon DS: Cute
overview: The female version of the Harvest Moon DS game. Play as one of two girl characters and try to win the affections of the boys in Forget-Me-Not Valley, as well as maintaining a prosperous farm.
